# Template using ojs for text input questions

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
correctAnswer = 4

feedback = {
  if (userAnswer === "") {
    return ""
  }
  else {
    return userAnswer == correctAnswer ? "✅ Correct!" : "❌ Try again."
  }
}
```
